name: openzktool-circuits
description: Circom circuits for OpenZKTool ZK-SNARK toolkit

scripts.test: cd build && snarkjs groth16 fullprove test_input.json kyc_transfer_js/kyc_transfer.wasm kyc_transfer_final.zkey proof.json public.json && snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json

author: Team X1 - Xcapit Labs
